Trade/Device Name(s): cobas BKV for use on the cobas 6800/8800 Systems
Regulation Name(s): Quantitative Viral Nucleic Acid Test for Transplant Patient Management
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas BKV real-time PCR assay on cobas 6800/8800 systems for quantitative detection of BK virus DNA in EDTA plasma for transplant patient management
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro nucleic acid amplification test for quantitation of BK virus DNA in human EDTA plasma as an aid in the management of BKV in transplant patients, to monitor DNA levels and assess response to treatment; not for blood donor or HCT/P screening.
